text: Sergio Ramírez Mercado (; born August 5, 1942) is a Nicaraguan writer and politician. He worked in the leftist Government Junta of National Reconstruction and as Vice President of the country from 1985 to 1990 under the presidency of Daniel Ortega.History of Vicepresidency ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Political writers Category:Vice presidents of Nicaragua Category:Essayists Category:Miguel de Cervantes Prize winners
title: Sergio Ramírez
